name: You're Late!!!
description:
You overslept, and you're late! Your ride will only wait for another minute before leaving! 

Use WASD to move, and E or Left Click to Interact.

In order to leave on time, you must complete your basic morning routine.

-----------------------------------

The posted build is the 3-hour build, so some/a lot of bugs will be present.

House Sprites from - https://teamdisgrace.itch.io/modernhouse

Interior Objects from - https://dreamypixelart.itch.io/pixel-art-interiors

Sound Effects from - mixkit.com

Player Character from - https://andreecy.itch.io/td-character-animation

Animations? What are those?
